core:process.core:comment: Captures the ETop Up card number and looks it up the IIN table. Loads the card type and ETop Up card type records. Sets card details and basic properties on the ETop Up card details object.

core:action.core:name: Card NUmber Lookup
core:action.core:comment: Lookup card number on IIN range table.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Sets properties on the ETop Up basket item details.

core:action.core:comment: Defensive only to create ETopUpCardDetails object if the item doesn't.

core:eventLink.core:comment: If we sell product first then capture card details
Product code is not set on IIIN range and product was not captured first. Should really prompt for product.
